Html:
Hi,

I am new in this forum and need some help. I downloaded the source code and found that it has 12 projects. One out of them is a demo but I could not make out what the others are.

There is a project called -The executable - This seems to have some WCF services. I am wondering how are they used in the project.

In the demo file there is an option of "Start Image Demo". I need something like that for my current requirement. Is there any documentation on that? The demo video shows the Drawing demo but not this. I am interested in knowing how to make my overlayed objects interact with change in marker positions (more like the Image Demo).

Can anyone please help?

Regards,

Anshu Dutta
